CustomField.formula: IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( LastModifiedDate ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( LastModifiedDate ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( LastModifiedDate ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( LastModifiedDate ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) )) & "_" & MID( TEXT( LastModifiedDate ), 15, 2 ) & "_" & MID( TEXT( LastModifiedDate ), 18, 2 ) & "_" & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( LastModifiedDate ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" )
CustomField.label: time
